<urn1:paymentIdentification>\r <urn2:messageIdentification>${=Math.abs(new Random().nextInt() % 6000000)+1}</urn2:messageIdentification>\r <urn2:endToEndIdentification>${#TestSuite#endtoendID}</urn2:endToEndIdentification>\r </urn1:paymentIdentification>\r <urn1:paymentInfo>\r <urn3:paymentMethod>TRF</urn3:paymentMethod>\r <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level-->\r <urn3:paymentTypeInformation>\r <urn3:serviceLevel>NRTR</urn3:serviceLevel>\r </urn3:paymentTypeInformation>\r <urn3:requestedExecutionDate>${#TestSuite#ReqExnDate}</urn3:requestedExecutionDate>\r <urn3:debtorAccount>\r <urn2:identification>${#TestSuite#debitAccount}</urn2:identification>\r <urn2:currency>NOK</urn2:currency>\r </urn3:debtorAccount>\r <urn3:debtorAgentBIC>SPTRNO22XXX</urn3:debtorAgentBIC>\r </urn1:paymentInfo>\r <urn1:transaction>\r <urn4:amount>\r <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level-->\r <urn2:instructedAmount currency="NOK">\r <urn2:amount>7</urn2:amount>\r </urn2:instructedAmount>\r </urn4:amount>\r <urn4:chargeBearer>DEBT</urn4:chargeBearer>\r <urn2:identification>70500100816</urn2:identification>\r <urn2:currency>NOK</urn2:currency>\r </urn4:creditorAccount>\r <urn1:creditorScorReference>310097025620800129379894</urn1:creditorScorReference>\r </urn1:transaction>\r </urn:paymentMessage>\r </urn:PaymentCreateRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
